subject: Baseball
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Even if Wright returns, the team is unsure what it can expect from him, which only adds weight to all the questions about his recovery and the Mets’ search for a stopgap replacement.
snippet: Even if Wright returns, the team is unsure what it can expect from him, which only adds weight to all the questions about his recovery and the Mets’ search for a stopgap replacement.
